title: (x) old skool game font - various {gang}
content:
anyone know this old skool game font? Or perhaps something that looks quite like that?   
   
 ![select game](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224722im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23659.jpg)   
   
Thanx,   
Ren

 [‹ (x) 1960s/70s The Omega Man - Rubens {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224722/http:/typophile.com/node/2613 "Go to previous forum topic") [These faces are grotesk! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224722/http:/typophile.com/node/2617 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Characters

comments.content: Looks like Joystix by Larabie Fonts, may be wrong, there's SO many fonts like that, you'd have no trouble finding an almost exact match.
